text: Not sure if anyone else has had this issue. With a select field. We use it for our certifications and it gets very cluttered.
try using a different browser, in some cases does help. But I agree that goes like that if you add too many.
<@U8RN3623Y> Is working on a fix for this
I am, its not an easy one but its next on the list

<@U8RN3623Y> any chance of getting the ability to choose a form that can be used for each HubDB table for data entry? I know we can just enter it in datasheet wise but sometimes its easier for folks to use a form (or to tell others to use a form) so they don't accidentally remove info from the DB.
A file, which can't be shown because your team is past the free storage limit, was commented on.
Either the ID or the name. This would allow us to use a password protected page and then have this form on it for internal purposes

like we built an events table for a client and they need to enter in the data for the event but the person who is in charge of that is not the most DB/Excel type literate and has in the past made changes that blew the DB up
This idea has come up a few times. I filed an issue to make sure we donâ€™t forget about it.
